issue_name: XML File Parsing Vulnerabilities in JT Open and PLM XML SDK

1.description: Update JT Open to version V11.5 or later. Download the update from: https://support.sw.siemens.com/product/259259756/

2.description: Update PLM XML SDK to version V7.1.0.014 or later. Download the update from: https://support.sw.siemens.com/product/242354484/

1.command: Do not open untrusted XML files
1.description: Avoid opening untrusted XML files in affected applications to mitigate the risk of exploitation.
